verbs.description: North Korea [V: is] threatening to reconsider Kim Jong Un 's participation in a summit with President Donald Trump next month .
[ARG0: North Korea] is [V: threatening] [ARG1: to reconsider Kim Jong Un 's participation in a summit with President Donald Trump next month] .
[ARG0: North Korea] is threatening to [V: reconsider] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un 's participation in a summit with President Donald Trump next month] .
